titleStmt.title: Of the knovvledge and conducte of warres two bookes, latelye wrytten and sett foorth, profitable for suche as delight in hystoryes, or martyall affayres, and necessarye for this present tyme.
titleStmt.author: T. P.
Proctor, Thomas, poet, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Proctor the poet, whose initials appear on [par.]2r; but in fact probably by a different Thomas Proctor.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
